Class: RGVec3

RGVec3(x, y, z) → {RGVec3}

A 3 dimensional vector which can represent a point, or direction and magnitude

Constructor

new RGVec3(x, y, z) → {RGVec3}

Creates a 3 dimensional vector.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
x Number the x componenet of the vector
y Number the y componenet of the vector
z Number the z componenet of the vector
